commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
-- VoIP Numara Tablosu SQL'i
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[voip_operator_numara](
    [voip_operator_numara_id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
    [voip_operator_tanim_id] [int] NOT NULL,
    [voip_operator_numara_VoIPNo] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL,
    [voip_operator_numara_Sifre] [nvarchar](20) NULL,
    [voip_operator_numara_IP] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
    [voip_operator_numara_Aciklama] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
    [voip_operator_numara_durum] [bit] NOT NULL,
    [voip_operator_numara_olusturmaTarihi] [date] NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[voip_operator_numara_id] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, OPTIMIZE_FOR_SEQUENTIAL_KEY = OFF) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO

-- Default deÄŸerler
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[voip_operator_numara] ADD DEFAULT ((1)) FOR [voip_operator_numara_durum]
GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[voip_operator_numara] ADD DEFAULT (getdate()) FOR [voip_operator_numara_olusturmaTarihi]
GO

-- Foreign Key
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[voip_operator_numara]  WITH CHECK ADD  CONSTRAINT [FK_voip_operator_numara_tanim] FOREIGN KEY([voip_operator_tanim_id])
REFERENCES [dbo].[voip_operator_tanim] ([voip_operator_id])
ON UPDATE CASCADE
ON DELETE CASCADE
GO

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[voip_operator_numara] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_voip_operator_numara_tanim]
GO
